hero.subheadline: Experience the timeless beauty and grace of purebred Arabian horses at Al-Faris. Where every detail speaks of quiet luxury.

services.title: Our World
services.subtitle: Step into a realm where passion meets purpose. Explore what makes Al-Faris a sanctuary for horses and horse lovers alike.

boardingPage.heroSubtitle: Where your horse receives the royal treatment they deserve
boardingPage.facilitiesSubtitle: Every detail of our boarding facility is designed with your horse's comfort and wellbeing in mind.
boardingPage.applySubtitle: Complete the form below and our team will reach out to discuss your needs.
boardingPage.alertSuccess: Application submitted! We will contact you shortly.

security.title: 24/7 Security
security.description: Round-the-clock surveillance and on-site staff ensure your horse's safety.

vet.title: Veterinary Care
vet.description: On-call veterinarians and regular health check-ups included.

nutrition.title: Premium Nutrition
nutrition.description: Customized feeding programs with premium hay and supplements.

exercise.title: Daily Exercise
exercise.description: Structured turnout schedules in our expansive paddocks.

form.specialNeedsPlaceholder: Any dietary restrictions, medical conditions, or special care needs...

1.quote: The care and attention at Al-Faris is unparalleled. My horses have never been happier.

2.quote: Training here has elevated my riding to championship level. The staff are world-class.

3.quote: My first experience with horses was magical. The team made me feel safe and confident.

horses.title: Our Collection
horses.subtitle: Each horse in our collection represents generations of careful breeding and Arabian excellence.

booking.title: Book Your Experience
booking.subtitle: Select your preferred service, date, and time to begin your journey with us.
booking.weekendInfo: Weekend dates (Sat-Sun) have adjusted pricing to accommodate higher demand.
booking.bookingSuccessMessage: We look forward to seeing you.

boarding.title: VIP Boarding & Care
boarding.subtitle: Exceptional stabling and care for your cherished horses.

climate.title: Climate-Controlled Stables
climate.description: Temperature and humidity controlled for optimal comfort year-round.

care.title: 24/7 Professional Care
care.description: Experienced staff on-site around the clock to ensure your horse's wellbeing.

nutrition.title: Custom Nutrition Plans
nutrition.description: Tailored feeding programs designed by equine nutritionists.

training.title: Exercise & Training
training.description: Daily turnout, exercise programs, and training sessions available.

medical.title: Veterinary Services
medical.description: Regular health checks and immediate access to veterinary care.

grooming.title: Professional Grooming
grooming.description: Daily grooming and maintenance by skilled grooms.

footer.aboutText: Established in 1987, Al-Faris has been dedicated to preserving the finest Arabian bloodlines and sharing the beauty of these magnificent horses with the world.
